metadata.title: CVE-2020-28476 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: ** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: CVE-2021-23336.Reason: This candidate is a reservation duplicate of CVE-2021-23336. Notes:All CVE users should reference CVE-2021-23336 instead of this candidate.All references and descriptions in this candidate have been removed toprevent accidental usage.

criterions.comment: python-tornado: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
